page.title: 02People's Opinions of Ashcott
page.content: The{population }haven't lived in the village all their lives. Most have moved in during the last 10 years. Most people who are{employed}are employed locally. Most people spend their spare time doing gardening shopping etc. Most think that there are adequate facilities some improvements mentioned were play area, letter box, phone box, shops near old people. Most people shop in the{village}a few in towns and very few in both. Everyone said Ashcott is a pleasant place to live. Most people thought the village was suitable for both{generations.}The average family size was four. Everyone thought it is suitable for dogs. No one would want to move to another village.
